markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs=""
>
[Swarmsuit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1401)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 93</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** attached to  explorer's clothing 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These thick, overlapping layers of clothing are coupled with a matching hat, outfitted with mesh netting around its wide brim to keep you safe from insects. You gain resistance 3 to physical damage from [swarms](/Traits.aspx?ID=239). Explorer's clothing altered in this way has a Dexterity cap of +2, check penalty of –1, and Speed penalty of –5 feet regardless of your Strength.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 1"
pfs="Standard"
>
Swarmsuit
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 93</row>

**Price** 20 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 8"
pfs="Standard"
>
Swarmsuit (Impenetrable)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 93</row>

**Price** 420 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

An impenetrable swarmsuit is made of expensive, finely crafted mesh designed to completely prevent swarms from getting inside. You gain resistance 10 to physical damage from swarms while wearing an impenetrable swarmsuit, rather than 3.
name: Swarmsuit (Impenetrable)
